seo.description: Step by step instructions for installing the YakShaver browser extension and using it
seo.openGraphDescription: Step by step instructions for installing the YakShaver browser extension and using it

pageBlocks.tryItNowTitle: Start recording with the YakShaver browser extension in 3 steps!

tryItNowCards.title: 1. Download
tryItNowCards.description: Download  the YakShaver browser extension from the Google Chrome store by clicking the button below.

tryItNowCards.title: 2. Pin
tryItNowCards.description: Click the ![](/TryItNow/puzzle.svg) at the top right of your browser, then the ![](/TryItNow/pin.svg) next to YakShaver to pin it to your browser window.

tryItNowCards.title: 3. Give Permissions
tryItNowCards.description: When prompted, allow YakShaver to use your system audio. Make sure you share your microphone from the current tab as well.
